page.title: 03RELIGION
page.content: The village of Moore is part of the parish of{All Saints' Daresbury.} Parishoners have to travel to Daresbury for Sunday services but a Holy Communion service is held once a week in the{Milner Institute Moore.} All Saints' Church is famous because{ {Lewis Carroll's }father was once rector.Many tourist's visit the church to look at the{Alice in Wonderland} stained glass window.There is a Methodist chapel in Moore which is in the Warrington circuit.It shares a minister with Stockton Heath Methoidist church. There are 2 Sunday services and a Sunday school. St. John the Evangelist C.of E. Walton is this year celebrating its centenary.It was built originally as a private church for the Greenall family and the estate workers.Catholics travel to Stockton Heath or Runcorn for worship.
